price: 108 où ils séjourneront pour l’éternité, sans jamais désirer le quitter.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
